page.title: 06BOSTON WEST SCHOOL CLUBS
page.content: In our school we have{13 clubs covering a wide range of interests. Here are the clubs with who runs them and when they are.{Mr. Cartwright runs {Gym}on Monday and{Football on {Tuesday.Mrs Haseldine runs Needlework {on Tuesday and Book club on Wednesday. {Mrs Green runs Guitars on Monday and {Recorders on Monday, Wednesday and {Thursday . Also Drama club on Friday. {Mrs Oliver (Juniors) runs Art club on {Thursday. Mrs Oliver (Infants) runs {Chess on Thursday. Mrs Coupland runs {Netball at Tuesday lunchtime. Mr. {Ginnever runs Y.O.C. at Wednesday lunchtime. The{teachers run the clubs {voluntarily,}and are at present not part of the teacher's contract.The Football club, Chess club and the Neball club play against different schools. The Music and Drama clubs often put on concerts.
